resources.string: Enter the amount of time you want to take a break for and the amount of time you want to study for, and then press start to begin studying. The study time page will display a timer, and you will also have access to the goals page where you can write down several goals. Once your study time is over, you will be brought to a page that displays the amount of time left in your break. You will be able to click the activity button which will bring you to a paint by numbers activity.
Enter study time in minutes here
Enter study time in minutes here
Enter break time in minutes here
Enter break time in minutes here
